extensionDescription.message: Fügt einen EIntrag zum Kontextmenü hinzu, durch den die Prüfsumme von Dateien berechnet werden kann.

contextMenu.description: The text shown in the context menu

headerText.description: The header text of the popup

placeholderText.message: Klicke zum Berechnen der Prüfsumme auf den Button
placeholderText.description: The Text that is shown in the Input field when nothing is there

calculateButton.description: The Text on the Calculate Button

copyButton.description: The Text on the Copy Button

waitText.description: The Text that is shown while calculating

errorText.description: This text is shown in the input field when something failed

copyToastNoChecksum.message: Die Prüfsumme muss vor dem Kopieren erst berechnet werden
copyToastNoChecksum.description: This Toast shwon when there is is Checksum to copy

copyToastSuccess.description: This Toast shwon when the Checksum is copied

versionText.description: The text that is shwon in the footer

aboutLinkViewSource.description: The text on the 'View Source' Link in the Footer

aboutLinkReportBug.description: The text on the 'Report Bug' Link in the Footer

aboutLinkTranslate.description: The text on the 'Translate' Link in the Footer

popupBrowseButton.description: The Text on the Browse Button in the Popup

optionsCalculatePageOpenText.message: Wo soll die Seite zum Berechnen geöffnet werden?
optionsCalculatePageOpenText.description: The Text in the Options Page

optionsCalculatePageOpenWindow.description: The Label of the 'In a Window' Radio Button on the Options Page

optionsCalculatePageOpenTab.description: The Label of the 'In a Tab' Radio Button on the Options Page
